amendment.description: To provide assistance to manage farmer and rancher stress and for the mental health of individuals in rural areas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1966 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1966 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4191-4192) To provide assistance to manage farmer and rancher stress and for the mental health of individuals in rural areas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1966 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1966 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 2301.
